features.extract_features.extract_features(model, img_path, output_path)[source]

A function that extracts a feature vector from an image tile

Creates a feature extraction model

features.generate_features module

features.smooth_labels module

A program that takes in the 4 scorers excel files and performs a label smoothing process in which the combination of each case is given a continuous value in [0, 1]

Date Created: June 6, 2023 Last Updated: June 19, 2023

features.smooth_labels.smooth_label(df)[source]

A function that computes the smoothed label value of a case

Args:

df (pd.DataFrame): The data frame representing a case

Returns:

int: The label value of the case

features.smooth_labels.write_csv(case_names, label_totals)[source]

A function that writes labels to a .csv file

Args:

case_names (list<str>): names of the cases label_totals (list<float32>): real-valued labels for the corresponding case
